2023-10-01.name: Grundy County Corn Festival
2023-10-01.summary: The festival in this town on the Illinois River between Ottawa and Joliet offers stagecoach and train rides, a crackerbox derby, a pie-eating contest, music, a carnival, Saturday fireworks and a parade at 2 p.m. Sunday.

2023-10-01.name: Northeast Iowa Artists' Studio Tour
2023-10-01.summary: Drive through scenic bluff country to see 35 artists at 27 sites around Decorah, Burr Oak, St. Lucas, Waukon, West Union, Cresco, New Albin, Lansing, Elgin and Clermont.

2023-10-06.name: Apple Festival
2023-10-06.summary: It's the 62nd year of this big festival on Lake Superior, which features  orchard tours, history  walks, an apple-peeling contest, live music and a big parade at 2 p.m.  Sunday.

2023-10-06.name: Scarecrow Weekend
2023-10-06.summary: There's a big scarecrow contest plus a             carnival, music, dance, children's activities and the Autumn on the Fox arts show in this town west of Chicago.

2023-10-06.name: Pumpkin Festival & Skeleton Invasion
2023-10-06.summary: Every year, this northern suburb of Chicago tries to break the record for most lighted jack-o-lanterns. In addition to all-you-can-carve stations, there will be costume, pie-eating and carving contests.

2023-10-07.name: Apple Festival
2023-10-07.summary: It's the 62nd year of this big festival on Lake Superior, which features  orchard tours, history  walks, an apple-peeling contest, live music and a big parade at 2 p.m.  Sunday.

2023-10-07.name: Rivertown Fall Art  Festival
2023-10-07.summary: This juried arts festival along the banks of the St. Croix River includes music and food vendors.

2023-10-07.name: Autumn on Parade
2023-10-07.summary: There's a market, Fun Zone for kids, classic car and tractor show, entertainment stage, beer garden and a parade at 1 p.m. Sunday.

2023-10-07.name: Oktoberfest
2023-10-07.summary: This festival just north of Milwaukee features music and food plus goofy contests: best lederhosen/dirndl, sauerkraut-eating, a German spelling bee and a live Glockenspiel show.

2023-10-07.name: Apple Affair
2023-10-07.summary: In the bluffs above Trempealeau, this festival features a 10-foot apple pie, a hunt for a Silver Apple, a race of floating wooden apples and a bicycle tour with a 20-mile route through apple orchards and hillier 35- and 60-mile routes.

2023-10-07.name: Scarecrow Weekend
2023-10-07.summary: There's a big scarecrow contest plus a             carnival, music, dance, children's activities and the Autumn on the Fox arts show in this town west of Chicago.

2023-10-07.name: Pumpkin Festival & Skeleton Invasion
2023-10-07.summary: Every year, this northern suburb of Chicago tries to break the record for most lighted jack-o-lanterns. In addition to all-you-can-carve stations, there will be costume, pie-eating and carving contests.

2023-10-07.name: Galena Country Fair
2023-10-07.summary: There's a juried fine arts/arts and crafts fair, farmers market, wine garden, bake shop, music and children's games in Grant Park.

2023-10-07.name: Burgoo Festival
2023-10-07.summary: The street party in this northern Illinois town, gateway to Starved Rock State Park, features vats of "pioneer'' stew, a crafts fair and music.

2023-10-08.name: Apple Festival
2023-10-08.summary: It's the 62nd year of this big festival on Lake Superior, which features  orchard tours, history  walks, an apple-peeling contest, live music and a big parade at 2 p.m.  Sunday.

2023-10-08.summary: This juried arts festival along the banks of the St. Croix River includes music and food vendors.

2023-10-08.summary: The street party in this northern Illinois town, gateway to Starved Rock State Park, features vats of "pioneer'' stew, a crafts fair and music.

2023-10-28.name: Thrills & Chills
2023-10-28.summary: This downtown Halloween party features a costume parade, make-your-own treat bags, haunted house, pumpkin carving and trick-or-treating from 10 a.m. to 3 p.m.

2023-10-28.name: Halloween
2023-10-28.summary: This town, just north of Minneapolis, calls itself the Halloween Capital of the World. Festivities include a house-decorating contest and a Grande Day Parade.

2023-10-28.name: Pumpkin Festival
2023-10-28.summary: This fall fest features arts and crafts shows, carnivals, a historic-house walk and a big parade on Sunday.

2023-10-13.name: Covered Bridge Studio Tour
2023-10-13.summary: This studio tour in eastern Wisconsin includes more than 60 artists in Cedarburg, Grafton, Port Washington, Mequon, Thiensville and Newburg.

2023-10-13.name: Chicago International Film Festival
2023-10-13.summary: Watch more than 80 films and 60 programs of shorts from around the world.

2023-10-13.name: Apple Festival
2023-10-13.summary: In this Lake Michigan town, there's a pumpkin-carving contest, children's activities and an arts and crafts show.

2023-10-13.name: Fall Festival
2023-10-13.summary: This Door County festival features pumpkin bowling, a derby race, chainsaw carving, a  pingpong-ball drop and a parade at 11 a.m. Saturday.

2023-10-14.name: Covered Bridge Studio Tour
2023-10-14.summary: This studio tour in eastern Wisconsin includes more than 60 artists in Cedarburg, Grafton, Port Washington, Mequon, Thiensville and Newburg.

2023-10-14.name: Madison County Covered Bridge Festival
2023-10-14.summary: John Wayne was born there, George Washington Carver lived there and the famous covered bridges still are there. The festival in this town southwest of Des Moines features guided bus tours to the bridges, free horse-drawn wagon rides to Wayne's house, Old West shootouts, live music and a parade at 2 p.m. Sunday.

2023-10-14.name: Harvest Fest
2023-10-14.summary: In this river town, there will be a pumpkin pie-eating contest, a pumpkin regatta on the St. Croix, a microbrew tasting and a pedal tractor pull.

2023-10-14.name: Red Wing Arts Fall Festival
2023-10-14.summary: More than 100 artist booths line four blocks of this Mississippi River town. There's also music and food.

2023-10-14.name: Chicago International Film Festival
2023-10-14.summary: Watch more than 80 films and 60 programs of shorts from around the world.

2023-10-14.name: Apple Festival
2023-10-14.summary: In this Lake Michigan town, there's a pumpkin-carving contest, children's activities and an arts and crafts show.

2023-10-14.name: Open House Chicago
2023-10-14.summary: The Chicago Architecture Foundation sponsors this free, behind-the-scenes peek at more than 200 mansions, clubs,  churches, hotels and theaters.

2023-10-14.name: Fall Festival
2023-10-14.summary: This Door County festival features pumpkin bowling, a derby race, chainsaw carving, a  pingpong-ball drop and a parade at 11 a.m. Saturday.

2023-10-21.summary: This downtown festival near Lake Geneva features wine and beer tasting, music, a car show, arts and crafts and a chili cookoff.

2023-10-21.summary: On the largest of the Apostle Islands, there will be a vintage-car show, cider- and soap-making, pumpkin decorating, a pie-eating contest, street vendors and a kids' costume parade.
